alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Autauga, Chilton and northwestern Coosa Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plecher, or 13 miles southwest of Clanton, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calera, Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Maplesville, Billingsley, Vida Junction, Gap Of The Mountain, Parnell, Marble Valley, Plecher, Lay Lake Dam, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Lay Lake, Pooles Crossroads, Mitchell Lake, Minooka Park, Lomax, Stanton and Waxahatchee Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
